article:
Formatting specifications for UBL Order Cancellation instances
2004OASIS $Date: 2006-12-20 21:26:13 $(UTC)
Order cancellation formatting specifications
Two sample formatting specifications are offered for this document type:
Office-oriented order cancellation form
United Nations Layout Key form 320 (subset): Order Cancellation
For a list of all formatting specifications and an overview of the documentation conventions, please visit the formatting specification home page.
&FS-status;
